statements: SELECT * FROM metadata
SELECT post_id, caption FROM metadata WHERE post_id = 123
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM metadata ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE caption LIKE '%beautiful%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM metadata
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT caption, image_url FROM metadata WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, image_url FROM metadata WHERE caption LIKE '%beautiful%' AND timestamp > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' AND caption IS NOT NULL ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM metadata WHERE image_url IS NOT NULL GROUP BY timestamp HAVING total_posts > 3;
SELECT post_id, timestamp, caption, image_url FROM posts;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT caption, image_url FROM posts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, caption FROM posts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT comment_id, comment FROM comments WHERE post_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT caption, timestamp FROM posts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT post_id, caption, image_url FROM posts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT post_id, caption, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM posts LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id GROUP BY post_id, caption ORDER BY comment_count DESC;
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.caption, comments.comment, comments.timestamp FROM posts JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE posts.post_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT caption, image_url FROM posts WHERE post_id = 'abc123';
SELECT post_id, timestamp FROM posts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT count(*) as total_likes, post_id FROM likes GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 'xyz456' ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT post_id, caption FROM posts WHERE LENGTH(caption) > 50
SELECT * FROM likes ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT comment_text FROM comments WHERE comment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
SELECT post_id, user_id FROM comments WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174005'
SELECT * FROM posts
SELECT post_id, caption FROM posts ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT post_id, image_url, caption FROM posts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS likes_count FROM likes GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY likes_count DESC
SELECT post_id, timestamp, caption, image_url FROM posts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT post_id, count(like_id) AS likes_count FROM likes GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY likes_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT U.username, C.comment_text FROM users U INNER JOIN comments C ON U.user_id = C.user_id WHERE C.comment_text IS NOT NULL AND U.username != 'admin';
SELECT U.username AS poster_username, P.caption AS post_caption FROM users U INNER JOIN posts P ON U.user_id = P.post_id WHERE P.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM posts;
SELECT post_id, caption, timestamp FROM posts;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, COUNT(like_id) AS total_likes FROM likes GROUP BY post_id;
SELECT user_id, post_id FROM likes WHERE post_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, caption, image_url FROM posts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, posts.caption, likes.timestamp FROM users INNER JOIN likes ON users.user_id = likes.user_id INNER JOIN posts ON likes.post_id = posts.post_id;

SELECT posts.caption, comments.comment_text, users.username FROM posts INNER JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id INNER JOIN users ON comments.user_id = users.user_id WHERE posts.post_id = 2;

SELECT posts.timestamp, COUNT(likes.like_id) AS like_count, tags.tag_name FROM posts LEFT JOIN likes ON posts.post_id = likes.post_id LEFT JOIN tags ON posts.post_id = tags.tag_id WHERE posts.post_id = 3 GROUP BY posts.timestamp, tags.tag_name;
